CustomBehavior.Text: You must be Horde to run this profile!

CustomBehavior.Lua: if MovieFrame and MovieFrame:IsVisible() then MovieFrame:StopMovie() elseif CinematicFrame and CinematicFrame:IsVisible() then CinematicFrame_CancelCinematic() end

PickUp.QuestName: Just Another Stick in the Wall

TurnIn.QuestName: Just Another Stick in the Wall

CustomBehavior.Text: Choose either Lumber Yard or Fight Club (Arena) - Only the Arena is completed for this zone - if you do not choose Arena, you will have the enjoyment of questing the entire zone by hand!

CustomBehavior.Lua: if MovieFrame and MovieFrame:IsVisible() then MovieFrame:StopMovie() elseif CinematicFrame and CinematicFrame:IsVisible() then CinematicFrame_CancelCinematic() end
if MovieFrame and MovieFrame:IsVisible() then MovieFrame:StopMovie() elseif CinematicFrame and CinematicFrame:IsVisible() then CinematicFrame_CancelCinematic() end
for i=1,40 do local id=select(11,UnitAura('player',i)) if id == 168474 then CancelUnitBuff('player',i) break end end
